metadata.Title: CVE-2013-7491 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description:
An issue was discovered in the DBI module before 1.628 for Perl. Stack corruption occurs when a user-defined function requires a non-trivial amount of memory and the Perl stack gets reallocated.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2013-7491` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libdbi-perl - 1.640-1
No subscription required

notes.Note: leosilva> precise backport can be a bit trick and cause regressions. For now, ignoring it.

criterions.comment: libdbi-perl package in bionic, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.640-1').
